thread.title: Eric Nam To Leave His MC Postion On tvN’s “Life Bar”
thread.title_full: Eric Nam To Leave His MC Postion On tvN’s “Life Bar”

author: choralee
title: Eric Nam To Leave His MC Postion On tvN’s “Life Bar”
text:
Eric Nam is leaving his MC position on the tvN variety show “Life Bar.” 
On March 14, a source from tvN’s “Life Bar” stated, “Eric Nam will be leaving [the show] after this week’s broadcast. From the beginning, he decided to join the show as a temporary member.” 
Eric Nam first joined “Life Bar” on January 18 when Lee Dae Hae guested on the show. He is leaving the show now after two months. 
The source continued, saying, “Eric Nam also has music activities and so the production team will be supporting him as he leaves the show.” 
Meanwhile, tvN’s “Life Bar” airs every Thursday night at 11 p.m. KST.
